title:
Representations of Real Numbers by Alternating Perron Series and Their
  Geometry
abstract:
We consider the representation of real numbers by alternating Perron series
($P^-$-representation), which is a generalization of representations of real
numbers by Ostrogradsky-Sierpi\'nski-Pierce series (Pierce series), alternating
Sylvester series (second Ostrogradsky series), alternating L\"{u}roth series,
etc. Namely, we prove the basic topological and metric properties of
$P^-$-representation and find the relationship between $P$-representation and
$P^-$-representation in some measure theory problems.
